jd: From: Anusha.vennapusa, w3global anusha.vennapusa@w3global.com Reply to: anusha.vennapusa@w3global.com Hi Hope you rae doing Good ********REMOTE OPPORTUNITY*********Job Title :GCP Cloud Engineer.Location: REMOTEEmployment Type: Contract to Hire, C2C, Contract, Full time / Direct Hire, 1099, OthersVisa: USC, H1-B, H4-EAD,GC Experience: 9+ Mandatory Skills : GCE, GKE, IAM, GCS and TerraformJob Post Description:Should have hands-on experience of managing GCP services such as GCE, GKE, IAM, GCS and other commonly used services beforeShould have 2-3 years of experience in building, deploying and debugging Terraform deployment templates in a Cloud EnvironmentShould have 2-3 years of hands-on experience in building, deploying and debugging issues around Helm Charts and Docker images on CloudHands on experience with Scripting languages such as bash shell or PythonSMEs need experience building apps for various API calls (usage reporting, Pub/Sub, etc.)Knowledge of Front end development and debugging techniquesShould have good knowledge on VM images (good to have GCE experience) types, OS, UNIX and LINUX OSHands on experience with Scripting languages such as bash shell or PythonPreferably have a GCP Cloud Solution Architect certificationNOTE : Please don't share Hotlist, Only Share resumes Anusha.vennapusa@w3global.com
